choose.when: WHERE title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%' OR description LIKE '%'||#{description}||'%'

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dadoc_challenges (num, writer, type, title, category, description, period, startdate, enddate, regdate, image) VALUES(challenges_seq.NEXTVAL, #{writer}, #{type}, #{title}, #{category}, #{description}, #{period}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, SYSDATE, #{image})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT num, writer, type, title, category, image, description, period, startdate, enddate, regdate FROM dadoc_challenges ORDER BY num DESC) WHERE num = #{num}
